Containers.Name: sonatype-nexus3
Containers.Description: [b]Description[/b][br] A Dockerfile for Sonatype Nexus Repository Manager 3, starting with 3.18 the image is based on the Red Hat Universal Base Image while earlier versions used CentOS.
Containers.Overview: A Dockerfile for Sonatype Nexus Repository Manager 3, starting with 3.18 the image is based on the Red Hat Universal Base Image while earlier versions used CentOS.
